00010 #include "../inc/memModule.h"
00011 
00012 /* The System's page directory */
00013 static directory_t *kernelDir = (directory_t *)((char *)(KERNEL_SPACE_SIZE) - sizeof(directory_t));
00014 
00015 /* Kernel Heap Definition */
00016 static void *kernelHeap;
00017 static frame_t *kernelFrame;
00018 
00019 /* Frame table Definition*/
00020 static framesTable_t framesTable;
00021 
00022 /*
00023  *      Bitmap Implementation
00024  */
00025

00027 
00028 void * getKernelHeap(){
00029         return kernelHeap;
00030 }
00031 
00032 void loadCR3(){
00033         asm volatile("mov %0, %%cr3":: "r"(&(kernelDir->pageDirectory)));
00034         
00035         return;
00036 }
00037 
00038 int initPaging(){
00039         unsigned int i, cr0;
00040 
00041         memset(kernelDir, 0, sizeof(directory_t));
00042         memset(framesTable, 0, sizeof(frame_t) * TOTAL_FRAMES_QTY);
00043         
00044         for (i = FIRST_KERNEL_TABLE ; i < KERNEL_TABLES_QTY ; ++i){
00045                 initKernelTable(kernelDir->tables[i]);
00046                 initPage(&(kernelDir->pageDirectory[i]), TRUE);
00047                 kernelDir->pageDirectory[i].address = ((unsigned int)(&(kernelDir->tables[i]))) >> 12;
00048         }
00049         for ( ; i < PAGE_TABLES_QTY ; ++i){
00050                 initMallocTable(kernelDir->tables[i], i);
00051                 initPage(&(kernelDir->pageDirectory[i]), FALSE);
00052                 kernelDir->pageDirectory[i].address = ((unsigned int)(&(kernelDir->tables[i]))) >> 12;
00053         }
00054         
00055         loadCR3();
00056         asm volatile("mov %%cr0, %0": "=r"(cr0));
00057         cr0 |= 0x80000000;
00058         asm volatile("mov %0, %%cr0":: "r"(cr0));
00059                 
00060         kernelFrame = getFrame();
00061         kernelHeap = (void *)kernelFrame->address;
00062         setKernelHeapPresence(FALSE);
00063         
00064         return 0;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void setKernelHeapPresence(int state){
00068         setFramePresence(kernelFrame, state);
00069 }
00070 
00071 void initPage(page_t *page, int isKernel){
00072         page->present = TRUE;
00073         page->writeable = !isKernel;
00074         page->user = isKernel;
00075         
00076         return;
00077 }
00078 
00079 int allocKPage(page_t *kernelPage){
00080         static unsigned int add = KERNEL_SPACE;
00081         
00082         initPage(kernelPage, TRUE);
00083         kernelPage->address = add >> 12;        
00084         add += PAGE_SIZE;
00085         
00086         return 0;
00087 }
00088 
00089 int initKernelTable(pageTable_t kernelTable){
00090         int i;
00091         
00092         for (i = 0 ; i < PAGE_ENTRIES_PER_TABLE ; ++i){
00093                 allocKPage(&(kernelTable[i]));
00094         }
00095         
00096         return 0;
00097 }
00098 
00099 int allocMPage(page_t *mallocPage){
00100         static unsigned int add = MALLOC_SPACE;
00101         
00102         initPage(mallocPage, FALSE);
00103         mallocPage->address = add >> 12;
00104         add += PAGE_SIZE;
00105         
00106         return 0;
00107 }
00108 
00109 int initMallocTable(pageTable_t mallocTable, int dirIndex){
00110         int i, j;
00111         static int frameIndex = 0;
00112         unsigned int dir = 0, table = 0;
00113         
00114         dir = dirIndex << 22;
00115         for (i = 0, j = 0 ; i < PAGE_ENTRIES_PER_TABLE ; ++i){
00116                 allocMPage(&(mallocTable[i]));
00117                 if (j == 0){
00118                         table = i << 12;
00119                         framesTable[frameIndex].address |= dir;
00120                         framesTable[frameIndex].address |= table;
00121                         ++frameIndex;
00122                         ++j;
00123                 }else{
00124                         j = ((j + 1) == PAGES_PER_FRAME) ? 0 : j + 1;
00125                 }
00126         }
00127 
00128         return 0;
00129 }
00130 
00131 void setFramePresence(frame_t *frame, int state){
00132         int i;
00133         unsigned int dirIndex = 0, tableIndex = 0;
00134         
00135         dirIndex = frame->address >> 22;
00136         tableIndex = (frame->address & 0x003FFFFF) >> 12;
00137         for (i = 0 ; i < PAGES_PER_FRAME ; ++i){
00138                 ((kernelDir->tables)[dirIndex][tableIndex + i]).present = state;
00139         }
00140         return;
00141 }
00142 
00143 frame_t * getFrame(){
00144         int i = 0;
00145         
00146         for (i = 0 ; i < TOTAL_FRAMES_QTY ; ++i){
00147                 if (!((framesTable[i]).assigned)){
00148                         framesTable[i].assigned = TRUE;
00149                         return &(framesTable[i]); 
00150                 }
00151         }
00152         return NULL;
00153 }
00154 
00155 int freeFrame(frame_t *frame){
00156         if (!frame->assigned){
00157                 return -1;
00158         }
00159         else{
00160                 frame->assigned = FALSE;
00161                 return 0;
00162         }
00163 }
